LanguageData.BlowingSand.stages.blowing_sand.label: blowing sand
LanguageData.BlowingSand.stages.blowing_sand.descript: It gets everywhere! I can feel it between my teeth.
LanguageData.DestroyedMechhive.stages.destroyed_mechh: We defeated them! We're free of them now.
LanguageData.HotSpring.stages.hot_spring.label: hot spring
LanguageData.HotSpring.stages.hot_spring.description: It's nice to dip my feet in the warm water.
LanguageData.ToxWater.stages.tox_water.label: tox water
LanguageData.ToxWater.stages.tox_water.description: I'm soaked in this disgusting stuff. It itches and burns.
